hobbies.reading_reviews_subtitle: Ana has always been an avid reader. Here is a list of recent reads.

book_reviews.monsters: A mesmerizing graphic novel about a girl obsessed with monster movies and trying to understand her world.
book_reviews.encabanee: A poetic and raw reflection on solitude, wilderness, and inner peace.
book_reviews.ahab: A sweeping novel of identity and survival inspired by Moby Dick.
book_reviews.florence: A tale weaving East and West, history and myth, in the Mughal Empire.
